devdoc.author: Gabriele Rigo - <gab@rigoblock.com>

addressFromId(uint256).details: Returns the address and the group of a pool from its id.

calcPoolValue(uint256).details: Returns the value of a pool from its id.

returns.aum: Total value of the pool in ETH.

creditPopRewardToStakingProxy(uint256).details: Credits the pop reward to the Staking Proxy contract.

params.poolId: Number of the pool Id in registry.

getHwm(uint256).details: Returns the highwatermark of a pool.

returns._0: Value of the all-time-high pool nav.

returns.epochReward: value of the reward factor or said pool.
returns.poolPrice: price of the pool in wei.
returns.poolSupply: total supply of the pool in units.
returns.poolValue: total value of the pool in wei.
returns.pop: value of the pop reward to be claimed in GRGs.

getPoolPrice(uint256).details: Returns the price a pool from its id.

returns.poolPrice: Price of the pool in wei.
returns.totalTokens: Number of tokens of a pool (totalSupply).

getRewardParameters(uint256).details: Returns the split ratio of asset and performance reward.

returns.ratio: Value of the ratio from 1 to 100.

isActive(uint256).details: Checks whether a pool is registered and active.

proofOfPerformance(uint256).details: Returns the proof of performance reward for a pool.

returns.performanceReward: Split of the performance reward in Rigo tokens.
returns.popReward: Value of the pop reward in Rigo tokens.

setAuthority(address).details: Allows rigoblock dao to update the authority.

setInflationFactor(address,uint256).details: Allows rigoblock dao to set the inflation factor for a group.

setRatio(address,uint256).details: Allows RigoBlock Dao to set the ratio between assets and performance reward for a group.

setRegistry(address).details: Allows RigoBlock Dao to update the pools registry.

setRigoblockDao(address).details: Allows RigoBlock Dao to update its address.
